sentences.en: It'seems the colder the market for jobs, the hotter the market for adultery.
sentences.cn: 似乎就业市场越冷清, 婚外情市场就越红火.

sentences.en: She had committed adultery on several occasions.
She has an adultery affair with the man.
That's correct. China an increasingly high divorce adultery is cited as a main reason.
sentences.cn: 对. 据说中国的离婚率增高,“第三者”是离婚的主要原因之一.

sentences.en: They say unto him, Master, this woman was taken in adultery, in the very act.
sentences.cn: 5摩西在律法上吩咐我们, 把这样的妇人用石头打死. 你说该把他怎吗样呢.

sentences.en: This constrained and messy adultery was a damned poor substitute for having a wife.
sentences.cn: 这种不自然的,不可告人的私情,也算是聊慰无妻之苦吧,但未免太糟糕了.

sentences.en: Why is it that so many senior business people are responding to recession with adultery?
sentences.cn: 为什么如此多的资深商业人士竟会以搞婚外恋来应对经济衰退?

trans.tran_en: sex between someone who is married and someone who is not their wife or husband
